title: Critical hits have lots of counterplay
body: Said no one ever. Nerf Tryndamere (Yasuo is fine, he doesn't get full crit damage, and isn't invincible).

replies.body: I hate tryndamere almost as much as fizz and akali. 3/5 trynda deleted me in exactly 3 autos. Are you gonna run away from it ? Slow + Spin every 0 secends. Are you gonna kill it ? Nope click R and keep deleting. Wtf can you do vs him.
Crits have exactly the same counterplay as regular auto attacks.
Tryndamere is a toxic champion, but as long as there are a bunch of people who like being toxic to downvote you for drawing attention to it, I don't think they're gonna do anything about it.

I've said this a couple of times...there is a lot more viability in taking out crit strike in general, but no one wants to because it removes the ability of some champs to right click to delete enemy...
Crits are really good for the game and not a lot of people are complaining about why can't you just play around it?

You might as well remove a sizable chunk of the roster while you're at it.

These forums are to discuss balance within the game, now how to destroy the game.
